about_the_game:
Miner Meltdown is a 2D team-based online competitive multiplayer game. Scour the map for minerals, upgrade your gear, and attempt to blow up the opposing team all the while avoiding monsters, traps, and environmental pitfalls along the way. Maps are randomly generated and 100% destructible, so every match is a fully unique, fast-paced, and chaotic affair.




  • 4 vs 4 online multiplayer
  • Randomly generated and 100% destructible terrain
  • Over 20 unique weapons and gadgets to choose from
  • Fast-paced gameplay using ropes and jetpacks to move around the map with ease.
  • Bots, so you can play online or solo
  • "Deathmatch", "Crazy King" & "Diamond Dash" game-types
  • Tons of thrust-dancing

Two teams of 4 spawn on opposite sides of the randomly generated mine. Players must explore the map in search for gold, which can be used to purchase better weapons and equipment. Teams that collect more gold will generally have an edge in battle.

Teams collect points by killing enemy players, or neutral monsters. The team with the most points at the end of the round is victorious.

Gameplay is fast-paced, so hold onto your butts.

highlighted.name: Kill 5 players with the assault rifle
Kill 15 players with the assault rifle
Kill 30 players with the assault rifle

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS / Linux Mint 17
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS / Linux Mint 18
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Leopard
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

reviews:
“It’s a fast, fun, charming and chaotic multiplayer game that revels in the simple joys of blowing stuff up”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“4v4 hectic and awesome edge of your seat chaotic fun.”
SmashGaminG!!!
short_description: Miner Meltdown is an action-packed team-based multiplayer game. Scour the map for minerals, upgrade your gear, and attempt to blow up the opposing team all the while avoiding monsters, traps, and environmental pitfalls along the way.
